snippet: The cost of cleaning up the oil spill that fouled California beaches last month has reached $69 million so far.
abstract: Plains All American Pipeline, company responsible for May oil spill on California coast, says cleanup costs have reached $69 million.
lead_paragraph: The cost of cleaning up the oil spill that fouled California beaches last month has reached $69 million so far.

headline.main: California: Cleanup of Oil on Beaches Has Cost $69 Million, Company Says
headline.print_headline: California: Cleanup of Oil on Beaches Has Cost $69 Million, Company Says
